amendment.description: To revise and extend the authority for an advisory panel on review of Government procurement laws and regulations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3273 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3273 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To revise and extend the authority for an advisory panel on review of Government procurement laws and regulations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3273 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3273 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe.
